section.name: Customize Openmeetings logo
section.p: If you want to set up your logo in Openmeetings header you can do the following:

ol.li: create your logo image as PNG 40px height

section.name: Customize Openmeetings mobile icons
section.i: This is available in OpenMeetings 6.2.0 or 7.0.0 and later

p.b: First: create the mobile icons assets. This can be done via a script

p.i: This example is generating assets using https://github.com/onderceylan/pwa-asset-generator

ol.li: Install the generation script: npm install --global pwa-asset-generator
Locate your logo.svg (svg as input recommended) and place into an empty folder
Generate images and HTML using: pwa-asset-generator logo.svg
The command above will generate all assets, place (and replace all) those into $OM_HOME/webapps/openmeetings/images/icons
